## Purpose

To track all batches of Mother Stock.

## Referenced By

- working_batches

## References

- microbe_types.code

## Columns

| column name | data type | constraints | purpose |
|:------------|:----------|:------------|:--------|
| batch | varchar(20) | Primary Key, Not Null | To be the unique identifier for other tables to reference.  It's assumed that mother stocks made on the same day will have have the same batch number. |
| microbe_code | varchar(10) | Foreign Key, Not Null | Which microbe;  references the microbe_types table and connects the microbe-specific data there. |
| qty | integer | - | The number of tubes originally made. |
| qty_remaining | integer | - | The number of tubes still available. |
| start_date | datetime | Not Null | When the mother stock was made or obtained. |
